response.body: { "id_agendamento": 999, "id_cliente": {{jsonPath request.body '$.id_cliente'}}, "id_usuario": {{jsonPath request.body '$.id_usuario'}}, "id_servico": {{jsonPath request.body '$.id_servico'}}, "data_hora_inicio": "{{jsonPath request.body '$.data_hora_inicio'}}", "data_hora_fim": "{{jsonPath request.body '$.data_hora_fim'}}", "status": "{{jsonPath request.body '$.status'}}", "observacoes": "{{jsonPath request.body '$.observacoes'}}" }
